CatDescriptText: Mr. Hymen Browarsky, manager, Wolf's Shoe Store, 6561 Rosemoor, was part of the Pittsburghers Speak Up column published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 2, 1958, pg. 2 with question: "Do you think waitresses should be paid a minimum of $1 per hour plus tips?" answer reads: "Yes, they should receive that minimum, because the cost of living has increased lately. Quite a few waitresses support entire families."
TitMainTitle: Portrait of Hymen Browarsky wearing light colored short sleeve shirt, standing on sidewalk with automobiles and buildings with signs, including one that reads "Firemans"
